imdb.plot outline: For over a hundred years, the Western has been the most classically American of film genres with its wide-open landscapes, sense of adventure and portrayals of rugged individualism. In July 2016, TCM will be presenting the largest showcase of Westerns in the history of the network. Hosted by actor and Oscar-winning songwriter Keith Carradine.
imdb.title: TCM Presents SHANE: Plus a Hundred More Great Westerns
akas: TCM Presents SHANE: Plus a Hundred More Great Westerns (United States)
plot: For over a hundred years, the Western has been the most classically American of film genres with its wide-open landscapes, sense of adventure and portrayals of rugged individualism. In July 2016, TCM will be presenting the largest showcase of Westerns in the history of the network. Hosted by actor and Oscar-winning songwriter Keith Carradine.::John Wilson
